item.title: All who log onto my server are mods...HELP!
item.dc:creator: @owningme1 owningme1
item.description:
@owningme1 wrote:

[quote=“P3NGU1N!!!, post:4, topic:63556”]He means please help.

If you are using a non-Testscape server go to the characters folder and double click the names of those on your server who you don’t want to be mods/admins/co-owners/owners and set their rights to ‘1’.

If you are using a Testscape server open up your client.java and press ctrl +f4. Type in ‘rights = 3’ and click ‘find next’. This will bring you to the names of admins (rights = 3), staff (rights = 2), and mods (rights = 1). If there names are in these (the players of your server that is) just delete their names and your problem is solved.[/quote]
Well, go into your character folder and edit all of the files to PlayerRights = 0

Read full topic
item.source: All who log onto my server are mods...HELP!

item.title: All who log onto my server are mods...HELP!
item.dc:creator: @P3NGU1N1 P3NGU1N!!!
item.description:
@P3NGU1N1 wrote:

He means please help.

  1. If you are using a non-Testscape server go to the characters folder and double click the names of those on your server who you don’t want to be mods/admins/co-owners/owners and set their rights to ‘1’.

  2. If you are using a Testscape server open up your client.java and press ctrl + F. Type in ‘rights = 3’ and click ‘find next’. This will bring you to the names of admins (rights = 3), staff (rights = 2), and mods (rights = 1). If there names are in these (the players of your server that is) just delete their names and your problem is solved.

1) Non-Testscape

Step 1:
Open up your non-Testscape source.

Step 2:
Open up your ‘Characters’ folder.

Step 3:
Double click the name of the person you don’t wish to be a mod/admin anymore.

Step 4:
Search for:

character-rights =

Step 5:
Replace that line with:

character-rights = 0

If you want them to not be a mod/admin anymore.

  1. Testscape

Step 1:
Open up your Testscape source.

Step 2:
Open up your client.java

Step 3:
Search for:

rights = 3

Step 4:
Replace the name of the player (ex. Penguin) with:

That’s it. Have fun.

Read full topic
